channel.title: Item Graphix
channel.description: is there any way to change the look of how a item look or maybe npc...anyone have a look to a tutorial if there is one or anyone have any ideas...cause im pretty sure you can do this...[br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 07:52:59 PM[/size][hr]c'mon no one knows if you can or cannot atleast cause i figured you had to use a client so i got that far.

item.title: Item Graphix
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

ok, c4d is Cinema 4D. as in 4 dimensional, yes?
I started using it because I like photoshop-and expanding that is awesome.
But to make graphics for a game is different.
Its gotta work with the game-Like in world 0, they put halo weapons and vehicles in runescape,
As for me, I put knives and better clothes lol.
Its really about the taste, coding ability-and if you know what your doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Item Graphix
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Personally, I can use c4d and make a new model and add it to the cache of a game->problem.
After so many are made it causes it to slow down from lack of space, so you need a rather large and powerful client to make it work.
Besides, you gotta know what your doing first, right?

Read full topic
